jam but the fastest route.traffic: I am afraid a traffic jam has occurred on your current route.
jam but the fastest route.delay: It causes a delay of 9 minutes.
jam but the fastest route.summary: You are still on the fastest route.

traffic jam and not the fastest route.traffic: I am afraid a traffic jam has occurred on your current route.
traffic jam and not the fastest route.delay: It causes a delay of 20 minutes.
traffic jam and not the fastest route.summary: You are no longer on the fastest route.

full blockage.traffic: I am afraid a full blockage has occurred on your current route.
full blockage.delay: It causes a delay of at least 120 minutes.
full blockage.summary: You are no longer on the fastest route.

no traffic.traffic: There are no traffic jams on your route.
no traffic.summary: You are on the fastest route.
